content:
The size of the file you are attempting to read into a byte array exceeds 4 GB. The My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllBytes method cannot read a file that exceeds this size.

To correct this error

  • Use a StreamReader to read the file. For more information, see Basics of .NET Framework File I/O and the File System (Visual Basic).

See Also

ReadAllBytes
StreamReader
File Access with Visual Basic
How to: Read Text from Files with a StreamReader
